snippet.title: From_. - Trailer (English version)
snippet.description:
Join Mr. Postman on an adventure to bring people together through the feelings in their letters. What will you write, and to whom?

[STORY]

Mr. Postman sails his small boat through watery Aquaria, delivering letters day in and day out.

One day, he awakes to find something strange and unbelievable following him, just as a dark rumor begins to spread through Aquaria.

As the letters he delivers bring writer and reader together, the truth begins to come into focus.

[MUSIC]

From_.'s music was recorded live. To enjoy these beautiful piano melodies, please consider wearing headphones while playing.

[TRIGGER WARNING]

From_. contains references to domestic abuse and suicide.


Website:https://www.nakajimanoma.com/from-english
